channel.description: Access Okta APIs with machine credentials Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Content is derived from two guides. Merge content from both to create this doc. Links to original docs: - Implement OAuth for Okta with a service app: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/implement-oauth-for-okta-serviceapp/main/ Build an API service integration: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/build-api-integration/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.
